# Generated by iptables-save v1.2.8 on Thu Nov 13 18:54:28 2003
*filter
:INPUT DROP [0:0]
:FORWARD ACCEPT [0:0]
:OUTPUT DROP [0:0]
iptables -A INPUT -i lo -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -i eth1 -p icmp -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -i eth2 -p icmp -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -s 213.195.64.15 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -s 192.168.69.0/255.255.255.0 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -s 169.254.0.0/255.255.0.0 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p udp -m udp --sport 161 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --sport 80 -m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --sport 20:21 -m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --sport 1024:65535 --dport 1024:65535 -m state --state ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -s 213.195.64.129 -p udp -m udp --sport 53 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -s 213.195.79.129 -p udp -m udp --sport 53 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -s 130.206.3.166 -p udp -m udp --dport 123 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 1:1024 -j DROP
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 19720 -j DROP
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 1972 -j DROP
iptables -A INPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 3306 -j DROP
iptables -A INPUT -p udp -m udp --dport 1:1024 -j DROP
iptables -A FORWARD -p icmp -j ACCEPT
iptables -A FORWARD -s 169.254.0.0/255.255.0.0 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A FORWARD -d 169.254.0.0/255.255.0.0 -p udp -m udp --sport 53 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A FORWARD -s 169.254.0.0/255.255.0.0 -p tcp -m tcp -j ACCEPT
iptables -A FORWARD -d 169.254.0.0/255.255.0.0 -p tcp -m state --state RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -o lo -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -p icmp -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -o eth1 -p icmp -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -o eth2 -p icmp -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -d 213.195.64.15 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -d 169.254.0.0/255.255.0.0 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -d 192.168.69.0/255.255.255.0 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -p udp -m udp --dport 161 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 80 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 20:21 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -p tcp -m tcp --dport 1024:65535 -m state --state NEW,RELATED,ESTABLISHED -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -d 213.195.64.129 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -d 213.195.79.129 -p udp -m udp --dport 53 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A OUTPUT -d 130.206.3.166 -p udp -m udp --sport 123 -j ACCEPT
COMMIT
iptables -A POSTROUTING -s 192.168.1.166/32 --sport 1024:65535 -d 0.0.0.0/0 --dport 6667 -p tcp -m tcp -j MASQUERADE
